attributes.title: The Making of Cosmic Airport for Sadashivoham 2016
attributes.description:
18 October Satsang 2016 by Paramahamsa Nithyananda
ATTENTION! The Number 1 Traitor in the Matrix is Postponement! Do not postpone your enlightenment and sign up now for Sadashivoham 2016. 
You need to have will persistence and take action to make it happen for you. In today's morning Satsang, Paramahamsa Nithyananda declares: “If you are 
an IA grad, Sadāshivoham is your right. Don’t miss it! If you not an IA grad, Sadāshivoham is your responsibility. Don't miss it!” 

Sadashivoham is going to be simply out of this world! Paramahamsa Nithyananda explains, “I am literally establishing a powerful high frequency zone, 
where all the high frequency beings can land, a kind of Cosmic airport.” With that and the near 20 Spiritual Alchemy Products being created by The Avatar 
Himself, Bengaluru Aadheenam will surely be flying in a different frequency entirely!
